profession.name: Pawn
profession.flavor: A Queen in training, this odd profession entitles the user to conjure up chess pieces and inherit some of their moves.

equipment.name: Short Practice Lance
equipment.flavor: Training lances like these are commonplace for Queens/Kings in the making.

equipment.name: Pawn's Armor
equipment.flavor: Cheap armor issued to every Pawn.

equipment.name: Odd Tiara
equipment.flavor: This odd-looking tiara is standard uniform for female soldiers in Judit's homeland.

a-skills.default: + Bishop's Teachings: The user is reminded of their teachings by the academy bishop and calms down. 80% DEF healing. Dispels mental ailments. Range: Self. 8 MP.
a-skills.description: Astonishingly quick, powerful blow with the user's Drive Blade, generating moderate heat buildup. D-Skill.

a-skills.default: + Pawn Strike: User embodies the strategical strength of a Pawn and strikes the opponent with force. If paired with Pawn Influence, the force of this attack is increased. 140% ATK damage, 120% otherwise.  Range: Adjacent cell. Chance of Immobilization (Mod +1). Use time: Instant. Hit rate: 100%. Variance: 0. 10 MP.
a-skills.description: Courses ambient Mana through one's Drive Blade like a cooling agent, also allowing the user to slightly replenish her Mana Pool.
a-skills.status-effect: If a Status Effect is applied to the target during this A-Skill, that Status Effect is here.
a-skills.modifier: The Chance Modifier for the Status Effect roll. Mod. 0 by default.

a-skills.default: + Castling: An evasive maneuver that can only be used on Allies on the same row or column. The User moves up to the Target and swaps Cells with them. Only consumes Move command if used before moving. Can only be used if the path is unobstructed. 8 MP.
a-skills.description: Destabilizes the target's Mana Pool with a single slash, causing it to continually leak out and into the user's Drive Blade. D-Skill.
a-skills.status-effect: If a Status Effect is applied to the target during this A-Skill, that Status Effect is here.
a-skills.modifier: The Chance Modifier for the Status Effect roll. Mod. 0 by default.

support: Unconventional attacker: Non-Adjacent attacks gain a 20% boost in critical-hit rate.
trigger: Three Moves Ahead - The user gains a sudden boost in their mental capabilities and quickly studies their surroundings, foes and allies. This boosts their strategic capabilities, allowing them to know where to strike and when to dodge. Increases ATK by 20% and Evasion by 30% for 3 turns. 5 X-Levels.
ability: Checkmate - The user of this fierce attack yells "Checkmate!" at the top of their lungs while ferociously striking a target in an attempt to destabilize nearby foes. 180% Piercing ATK damage. High chance of Immobilize to all enemies. Range: Adjacent cell. 10 X-Levels. (Pawn Influence: OK)
